memory.name: Memory & Attention
memory.desc: Short-term recall, sequence tracking, symbol matching, and pattern retention.

memory.digits_01: Memorize the following digits and select them in the same order.
memory.letters_03: Remember the order of these letters.
memory.words_05: Which word appeared in the previous list?
memory.words_06: Select the word that was not in the earlier group.
memory.visual_07: Identify which grid matches the pattern you just saw.
memory.visual_07.alt: Four small grids with black squares; one repeats the memorized layout.
memory.visual_08: Which image matches the previous display?
memory.visual_08.alt: Abstract geometric symbols; one is identical to prior image.
memory.symbol_09.alt: Set of four geometric symbols; one matches memorized shape.
memory.symbol_10: Select the correct symbol pair seen earlier.
memory.story_11: A cat chased a mouse into the garden. What chased the mouse?
memory.story_12: Tom bought apples, oranges, and bananas. What was the first fruit?
memory.sequence_14: Repeat the order of tones you just heard.
memory.auto_common: Remaining auto-generated visual memory tasks (m15–m40) test sequence and recall ability of briefly shown images or symbols.
